options.name: use
options.description: Enable the command whitelist and disable the blacklist. IF ENABLED, NO COMMANDS WILL WORK UNLESS ADDED TO THE WHITELIST

options.name: add
options.description: Add a command to the whitelist by name

options.name: command
options.description: The command to be added to the whitelist

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a command currently on the command whitelist

options.name: command
options.description: The command to be removed from the whitelist

options.name: view
options.description: View the contents of the command whitelist.

options.name: clear
options.description: Remove all commands currently on the command whitelist. If the whitelist is enabled, NO COMMANDS WILL WORK UNLESS ADDED TO THE WHITELIST
